players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I'm really shaken by Diana's death. We should all share our thoughts and try to figure out who might be behind this."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafia. I investigated him last night."
You: "I think we should hear from Bob before jumping to conclusions about Charlie's claim."
You: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why not investigate someone else next? Bob, defend yourself."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafia, and I have the proof from my investigation. We can't afford to waste time listening to his defense—he's trying to sow doubt and confusion."
Bob: "Charlie, your claim doesn't add up. If you're the detective, why accuse so quickly without evidence? I'm not the mafia—maybe you're trying to divert attention."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested
